```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
load("env.RData")
```

# Friendship Network

## Transitivity
```{r echo=FALSE}
tbd21 <- tboot_f2 - tboot_f1
tbd32 <- tboot_f3 - tboot_f2
tbd43 <- tboot_f4 - tboot_f3
tbd31 <- tboot_f3 - tboot_f1
tbd42 <- tboot_f4 - tboot_f2
tbd41 <- tboot_f4 - tboot_f1

tjd21 <- tjack_f2 - tjack_f1
tjd32 <- tjack_f3 - tjack_f2
tjd43 <- tjack_f4 - tjack_f3
tjd31 <- tjack_f3 - tjack_f1
tjd42 <- tjack_f4 - tjack_f2
tjd41 <- tjack_f4 - tjack_f1

ft <- matrix(NA, nrow = 6, ncol = 4)
rownames(ft) <- c('Time 2 - Time 1', 'Time 3 - Time 2', 'Time 4 - Time 3', 'Time 3 - Time 1', 'Time 4 - Time 2', 'Time 4 - Time 1')
colnames(ft) <- c('Boot diff 2.5%', 'Boot diff 97.5%', 'Jack diff 2.5%', 'Jack diff 97.5%')

ft[1,] <- c(quantile(tbd21, c(.025, .975)), quantile(tjd21, c(.025, .975)))
ft[2,] <- c(quantile(tbd32, c(.025, .975)), quantile(tjd32, c(.025, .975)))
ft[3,] <- c(quantile(tbd43, c(.025, .975)), quantile(tjd43, c(.025, .975)))
ft[4,] <- c(quantile(tbd31, c(.025, .975)), quantile(tjd31, c(.025, .975)))
ft[5,] <- c(quantile(tbd42, c(.025, .975)), quantile(tjd42, c(.025, .975)))
ft[6,] <- c(quantile(tbd41, c(.025, .975)), quantile(tjd41, c(.025, .975)))

as.table(ft)
```

# Tortoise Network

## Transitivity
```{r echo=FALSE}
tbd1 <- tboot_t98 - tboot_t97
tbd2 <- tboot_t99 - tboot_t98
tbd3 <- tboot_t99 - tboot_t97

tjd1 <- tjack_t98 - tjack_t97
tjd2 <- tjack_t99 - tjack_t98
tjd3 <- tjack_t99 - tjack_t97

tt <- matrix(NA, nrow = 3, ncol = 4)
rownames(tt) <- c('1998 - 1997', '1999 - 1998', '1999 - 1997')
colnames(tt) <- c('Boot diff 2.5%', 'Boot diff 97.5%', 'Jack diff 2.5%', 'Jack diff 97.5%')

tt[1,] <- c(quantile(tbd1, c(.025, .975)), quantile(tjd1, c(.025, .975)))
tt[2,] <- c(quantile(tbd2, c(.025, .975)), quantile(tjd2, c(.025, .975)))
tt[3,] <- c(quantile(tbd3, c(.025, .975)), quantile(tjd3, c(.025, .975)))

as.table(tt)
```
